name: Ultimate Hotel Simulator 5000 (UHS5K)
description:
Build a hotel to satisfy your guests. Hire staff to clean up, build new and furnish your rooms
and hope that your guests leave good reviews (Stars). Expand your hotel with extra facilities, like a
pool, a gym, a sauna (+) and many other such amenities. Guests have different demands and expectations
for the rooms they want to stay in and what other facilities they want to use during their stay. Provide
the right room and facilities for the right person to earn better reviews.

You can play it on http://www.zellot.at/uhs5k/index.html.Github: https://github.com/Xifiggam/UHS5K
